ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: As i promissed you Lago, here is the URL for it http://www.nessoft.com/joystickmacro/ i installed it but havent played with it yet ... From: Mott, Mike J.
ygData.messageBody:
As i promissed you Lago, here is the URL for it
http://www.nessoft.com/joystickmacro/

i installed it but havent played with it yet

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: October 12, 2000 2:02 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...


I have a MS Sidewinder, would love a link to that program if you have it.

Lago Bardoon

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [SMTP:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 12:52 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
> omg you're up to 29, you've been busy i see. Halana when ya can take on
> giants in rathe, do it 8)
>
> Those 5 bards joking around that you should quit now are deep down giving
> your cries for help. Someone posted a link on concert hall for a proggie
> that lets you macro in eq using a MS sidewinder, i gotta check it out
> soon,
> my joystick is getting pretty dusty. Might want to suggest that to them,
> supposedly you can type while its macroing (example: heal/mana in
> downtime)
> so that means you just twist during fights and stuff, not in downtimes
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: October 12, 2000 1:43 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
>
> Paradigm has 5 bards I believe, all 55+ and of course they all rock :)
>
> However, every one of them laughs at me for playing Tani. The other day,
> I
> told one "Hey, I just learned something about Bard-dom".. she replies,
> "What? That you should quit now?" Found it kind of funny... but seriously,
> they mostly complain aobut their hands being tired from twisting hehe.
>
> Halana, 56th eternally (damn these quests) Shaman
> Tani, 29th Bardette
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 11:35 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
> >
> >
> > 3 50+ active bards: Me, just made 54. Suladan 55 still plays his bard
> > pretty much. Kaldivar 53 not really enjoying high level life
> > (hard to get
> > good groups, exp so slow, etc. etc.) so he has been leveling
> > up a warrior
> > and playing other classes.
> >
> > Lately, I have been playing 52 Cleric and 51 Enchanter.
> > Learning these
> > other classes is more interesting to me at the moment. Also,
> > I have 2 PC's
> > now and spend a fair amount of time driving 2 chars.
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> > > Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in
> > your guilds?
> >
